import { useContext , useState} from "react" import { AuthContext } from "../../contexts/auth" import firebase from "../../services/firebaseConnection" import "./dashboard.css" export default function Dashboard(){ const [titulo, setTitulo] = useState("") const [tarefa, setTarefa] = useState("") const [hora, setHora] = useState("") const [dia, setDia] = useState("") const { signOut , user} = useContext(AuthContext) async function handlecreate(e){ e.preventDefault() if(dia !== "" && hora !=="" && tarefa !=="" && titulo !==""){ await firebase.firestore().collection("tarefas") } } return(

ToDoList

{user.nome}

setTitulo(e.target.value)}> setTarefa(e.target.value)}>
setHora(e.target.value)}> setDia(e.target.value)}>

Tarefas:

) }
